transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji madam.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ji, kaun bol raha hai?
Customer: Madam Radhika Traders se bol rahe hain Chandan Gupta.
Executive: Ji ji, bataiye.
Customer: Madam ek requirement thi ki matlab humne inko call kiya ab ye call kaat rahe hain, inko order chahiye ya nahi chahiye ye jara clear kar denge.
Executive: Matlab aapne buylead consume ki thi?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Kaun si?
Customer: Raj Singh ke naam se hai.
Customer: Shambhu Sharan Singh.
Executive: Hamare paas name aur number vagera nahi aata hai na. Aapne kab consume ki thi? Kahan ki hai lead?
Customer: Ye lead Gorakhpur ki hai 12:43 se humne kari hai aaj.
Executive: To aapne call kiya baat hui?
Customer: Madam ek baar phone uthaya nahi, dusri baar call kiya to phone cut kar diya bande ne.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Dusri baar kiya to?
Customer: Cut kar diya phone.
Executive: Haan to mere paas number vagera nahi aata hai sir. Aapka jo bhi aap lead vagera consume karte ho na usme jo data hota hai na wo confidential hota hai to wo aise varna fir koi bhi leak kar sakta hai na aapki lead ko.
Executive: Aise to mere paas number to nahi hai. Aap mujhe number share kar dijiye whatsapp pe.
Executive: To main ek baar try kar lungi agar lekin aapka nahi uthaya to mera bhi nahi uthaya.
Executive: Ho sakta hai busy ho ya kuch kar rahe ho.
Executive: Aap thodi der baad reminder laga ke call bhi to kar sakte ho.
Customer: Reminder laga ke call kiya hai. Dobara call kiya to phone cut kar diya.
Customer: Ab ye farji to nahi pada hua ispe ki aise hi abhi mere kaam ka order tha ye.
Executive: Haan to ab agar wo phone nahi utha raha hai to aap ek kaam karo.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ye kehte hain and one more thing aapke paas mera number available nahi hai kya?
Customer: Madam number yaad nahi hai. Number aap boliye ho sakta hai save ho. Actually mobile bhi badla gaya hai na isliye kuch number chale gaye the.
Executive: To aapke IndiaMART app mein jo niche matlab aap free layout mein jaate ho waha pe aata hai account manager ka number.
Executive: Jo bhi aapke present mein account manager hota hai uska number waha par aata hai. Number dial karke dekhna ek baar.
Customer: Madam kahan pe aata hai isme?
Executive: IndiaMART app khol liya?
Customer: Khol raha madam chal nahi raha.
Executive: Nahi aap aise bataiye ise khol ke three dot line hai uske baad mein click karke niche aayenge.
Customer: Haan. Haan pe aa raha hoga expert assistance karke aa raha hoga.
Customer: Expert assistance karke aa raha hoga.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Aa raha hai? Isi mein hoga number. Madam khol nahi raha abhi.
Customer: Khul nahi raha? Theek hai number nahi call kar dijiye to bol do.
Customer: Haan bol to rahi hu.
Customer: 537
Customer: 20
Customer: 960
Customer: 960
Executive: 82
Customer: Madam dekh lijiye 5372096082.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai whatsapp pe number.
Executive: Abhi humne video meet ki to thi us din.
Customer: Haan haan hum samajh gaye madam. Usi din nahi tab shayad mobile badla nahi tha madam fir baad mein badla mobile maine.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Aur sir ye hai aapne 9696 pe call kiya hai na.
Executive: Madam jaise yaha pe concern raise ho gaya hai matlab kind of complaint type hota hai wo maan lijiye.
Executive: To aapko matlab bas yahi hai na ki ye buyer ko aap call kar rahe the isne call nahi uthaya aur second time mein aapne call cut kar diya.
Customer: Haan madam ek call aaya tha mere paas buyer ka. Haan to usse baat hua to fir humne usko call kiya to usne phone kaat diya.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Lekin haan aise double hamare paas details bhi rehti hai na number vagera isliye ek minute. Madam isme kahan se aata hai number jara batayenge isme jaise three dot aa gaya help likha hua hai uske upar three dot line hai.
Executive: Niche dekhiye buyleads products ye sab aa raha hai latest buyleads products ke niche hi dekhiye.
Executive: Haan haan expert assistance aa raha hoga customer support ya kuch.
Customer: Buyleads help buyleads.
Customer: Madam kya likh ke aa raha hai isme? Expert assistance.
Customer: Chaliye koi nahi khul nahi raha fir hum isme hum try karke whatsapp pe aapko bhej de rahe madam. Theek hai.
Executive: Isse hum save karke aapko whatsapp pe hum uska number bhej rahe hain.
Executive: Whatsapp number dusra hai mera sir whatsapp number likh lijiye whatsapp pe bhejna hai to.
Executive: 6266 wo 537 wala hai madam?
Executive: Nahi nahi 6266
Executive: 6266
Executive: 18
Executive: 18
Executive: 5509
Executive: 5509. Theek hai madam bhej rahe hain aapko isi pe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called a buyer, but they cut the call.

- Wants the executive to clarify order status.



Resolution:

- Executive explained data privacy policy.

- Executive shared her WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send the number on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, order, whatsapp number, expert assistance
